name: Zippo (itch)
description:
A prototype game by the RAD-LÖVE-CREW for the LÖVE 2019 Jam.

Sir Zippo is on a quest to stop the evil Auqa! Your job is to protect the Fire. You keep a part of it within you, but a fire needs fuel. Defeat enemies (mosses, chars) and grind the flint to regain your burning passion!

This is a prototype, we plan to do more with this later on!

Credits:
NotQuiteApex - programming
Owlmoss - artwork
salmonbutter & nulln - music

Notes:
- The credits in-game are currently busted, viewing them will softlock the game.
- Temporary tiles are from Faithful x32 Minecraft resource pack.
- The game files were updated to fix a crash on MacOS devices.
